descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 20 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# Battlenauts: A Thrilling Mixed Reality Space Strategy Game

Battlenauts is a 4-way mixed reality space strategy game that thrusts you into the heart of a cosmic struggle. As the commander of Earth's starfleet, you find yourself racing against rival factions to control a newly discovered, mysterious anomaly. This anomaly is the gateway to an entire new solar system and it’s resources, and every decision you make could tip the balance of the galaxy. Prepare for an intense, fast-paced experience that combines strategy, tactical combat, and dynamic multiplayer competition.

**10 Single-Player Campaign Missions:** Embark on a gripping journey across the stars in the single-player campaign. Each mission brings unique challenges and strategic choices that require you to outmaneuver and outthink your rivals, while navigating through hostile space.

**Up to 4-Player Multiplayer Mode:** Test your strategic prowess against up to three other players in competitive multiplayer matches. Whether you’re playing with friends or strangers, you’ll need to adapt to the ever-shifting dynamics of space warfare. Choose between public and private matches to suit your preferences.

**Mixed Reality Combat:** Battlenauts takes full advantage of mixed reality technology, blending the virtual and real worlds. As you command your fleet, you’ll interact with immersive 3D star systems, strategize on real-time space maps, and engage in heart-pounding space battles that feel truly alive.

Battlenauts is a 4-way mixed reality space strategy game that thrusts you into the heart of a cosmic struggle. As the commander of Earth's starfleet, you find yourself racing against rival factions to control a newly discovered, mysterious anomaly. This anomaly is the gateway to an entire new solar system and it’s resources, and every decision you make could tip the balance of the galaxy. Prepare for an intense, fast-paced experience that combines strategy, tactical combat, and dynamic multiplayer competition.

**10 Single-Player Campaign Missions:** Embark on a gripping journey across the stars in the single-player campaign. Each mission brings unique challenges and strategic choices that require you to outmaneuver and outthink your rivals, while navigating through hostile space.

**Up to 4-Player Multiplayer Mode:** Test your strategic prowess against up to three other players in competitive multiplayer matches. Whether you’re playing with friends or strangers, you’ll need to adapt to the ever-shifting dynamics of space warfare. Choose between public and private matches to suit your preferences.

**Mixed Reality Combat:** Battlenauts takes full advantage of mixed reality technology, blending the virtual and real worlds.
